description: Maria Kolesnikova is one of three women who joined forces to oppose President Lukashenko.
title: Belarus protests: Maria Kolesnikova 'detained by masked men'
title_page: Belarus protests: Maria Kolesnikova 'detained by masked men' - BBC News
maintext: "They talk about the brutality of the Belarusian police, and I want to say this: there are no more humane, restrained and cool-headed police anywhere in the world," he was quoted as saying by the official Belta news agency.
